data.name: Bite the Bullet
data.description:
Bite the Bullet is an virtual reality action/strategy game where YOU command troops alongside them on the battlefield! Build and defense your basecamp, summon units to fight directly from the battlefield, and wipe your opponent from the map!

Spawn self-sufficient soldiers, tanks, helicopter gunships and bombers, all from your wrist! Your troops will mercilessly hunt the enemy, but will need reinforcements to triumph! You can even pick up a weapon yourself in a crisis to pitch in!

As the number of basecamps you control grow, your choices in what buildings to construct directly influences the type of army you can field! Just don't forget to build defensive turrets, against both ground threats and those from the sky!

changelog.change_log:
Hanaford 0.0.4 Release Notes

- Continuous Movement and Turn options.
- Tunneling Vignette added to Continuous Movement and Turn.
- Better cleanup of world if you quit via Wrist UI.
- Added version to Title Screen.
- Reversed controls to better work with Continuous Movement and Turn. In short Left Controller Stick for locomotion and Right Controller Stick for turning.
- Updated tutorials for new movement options.
- Disabled confusing interactor toggle. If you're not carrying a weapon in your hand, you have a visible interactor ray.
- Can no longer spawn a weapon in hand if you've already picked up weapon from ground.

Basic Tutorial & Title Screen
Increased Render Scale to improve visuals
Left Controller interactor on by default
Increased rocket launcher projectile speed
Improved speed and turn rate of AA missiles
Slowed down bombers slightly
Bullet weapons now aim at center mass of target
Fades on scene transitions
Quit button added to Wrist UI
Updated Unity
Fixed tons of bugs
